name: Card Chef
description:
Card Chef is a game, where you run restaurant in the world, where people are always don't know exactly what they want to eat, they only know how tasty, how fancy and how fat the food should be. Your task is serve customers using food cards with dishes as close to their desire as possible with your card set.

How to play?

Try to make a dish using your food cards with stats that fit the customer's desire as closely, as you can. To serve customer with your dish, you need to click on the cash register. Each fit with the customer's desire earns you a star. If you click on it without using any single card, the customer will be rerolled, which costs 1 star.

The game is endless, so if you need some goal, try to earn all 6 achievements.

Credits

LinkinWires - Code, gameplay, most of the art
Sonya S. - Customers art

The game uses these assets:

Music
Purrple Cat - Black Cherry
Rexlambo - I'm Falling
Sounds
Card Flip by f4ngy
Card Shuffle by empraetorius
Dealing Card by f4ngy
Cash Register by kiddpark
Dice Rolling - Dungeon and Dragons by joanneneedsthesound
